ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client is pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant""Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Bacille Calmette–Guérin (BCG) vaccination is contraindicated'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated"'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancyDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancyDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is not recommended during pregnancy Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
The client has history of severe allergic reactions'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions"'"Potential contraindications" = "Severe allergic reactions" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Do not vaccinate client with BCG if the client had previous allergic reaction to any component of the vaccineDo not vaccinate client with BCG if the client had previous allergic reaction to any component of the vaccineDo not vaccinate client with BCG if the client had previous allergic reaction to any component of the vaccine Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
The client has immunodeficiency syndromes"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes""Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
BCG vaccination is contraindicated'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated"'"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients with immunodeficiency syndromesDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients with immunodeficiency syndromesDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients with immunodeficiency syndromes Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
The client is exposed to immunosuppressive treatment"Potential contraindications" = "Exposed to immunosuppressive treatment""Potential contraindications" = "Exposed to immunosuppressive treatment" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Clients age is less than 1 year"Age" < 1 year"Age" < 1 year Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Do not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients undergoing immunosuppressive treatmentDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients undergoing immunosuppressive treatmentDo not vaccinate client with BCG as BCG vaccination is contraindicated for clients undergoing immunosuppressive treatment Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Clients age is more than or equal to 1 year"Age" ≥ 1 year"Age" ≥ 1 year Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
Do not vaccinate client with BCG if client is exposed to or receives immunosuppressive treatmentDo not vaccinate client with BCG if client is exposed to or receives immunosuppressive treatmentDo not vaccinate client with BCG if client is exposed to or receives immunosuppressive treatment Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.BCGcontraindications * Tabs: BCG
